title: Shirley Link & the Black Cat
description: *The author is listed as Ben Graham at Amazon, but shows under Ben Zackheim's profile. Ben Graham doesn't have one. I have listed both authors here.In her fourth adventure, Shirley Link takes a walk on the dark side of her hometown. When a young man, known for making trouble, is targeted as suspect #1 in a string of robberies, Shirley works hard to find the truth.But even if she proves his innocence, can she save him from himself?Join Shirley on her most daring adventure yet!
author: Ben Zackheim
